Package com.hcl.voltmx.sync.services.interceptor

Interface Summary
ISyncClientContext Interface for the client context
ISyncConflictContext Interface for the Conflict context.
ISyncConflictResolutionInterceptor The interceptor interface for conflict resolution.
ISyncDownloadInterceptor The interceptor interface for client download requests.
ISyncMergeInterceptor The interceptor interface for Merge service.
ISyncNotificationContext Interface for the Notification context.
ISyncNotificationInterceptor The interceptor interface for notifications.
ISyncOperationContext Basic interface for the interceptor context.
ISyncReplicaInterceptor The interceptor interface for Replica service.
ISyncRequestContext Interface for the Request context.
ISyncResponseContext Interface for the Response context.
ISyncUploadInterceptor The interceptor interface for Upload service.
